Description: True or false? Anyone infected with COVID-19 start have diarrhea and increases the chances of death compared to person who just start respiratory symptoms, why?
DialogueText:
Patient:
True or false? Anyone infected with COVID-19 start have diarrhea and increases the chances of death compared to person who just start respiratory symptoms, why?
Doctor:
In brief: Data
From Data from China there has been association between worse infection and diarrhea.
The seems to be a worse inflammatory response associated with people who have diarrhea.
